attributes.action: Remove VAT from all Covid-19 PPE and sanitizing products.
attributes.additional_details: Many working people and small businesses are not VAT registered and due to current high demand these products are already expensive without the tax imposed.
attributes.background:
VAT is paid on disposable face masks, gloves and sanitizing products used to comply with current Covid-19 prevention guidelines.
For the duration of the pandemic I ask the UK Government to suspend the tax on these products.
